snippet.name: FarCry Type
snippet.help: Creates an empty FarCry custom type
snippet.starttext: <cfcomponent output="false" extends="farcry.core.packages.types.$${Extends:types|versions}" displayname="$${Display Name}" hint="$${Hint}" bFriendly="$${Friendly URLs?:true|false}" bObjectBroker="$${Object Broker?:true|false}">
